00019 #include <memory.h>
00020 
00021 #ifdef _WIN32
00022 #include <winsock2.h>
00023 #include <windows.h>
00024 #else
00025 #include <time.h>
00026 #define min(a,b) (a < b ? a : b)
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #include "IcmpPacket.h"
00030 
00031 const uint32_t IcmpPacket::m_dataBytes = 0xCAFEBABE;
00032 
00033 // define a icmp header structure
00034 IcmpPacket::IcmpPacket(const unsigned int id, const unsigned int sequence, const unsigned int size)
00035 {
00036         m_size = size;
00037         m_buffer = new char[size];
00038         memset(m_buffer, 0, size);
00039         m_icmp_packet = (icmp_packet *)m_buffer;
00040 
00041         m_icmp_packet->header.type = ICMP_TYPE_ECHO_REQUEST;
00042         m_icmp_packet->header.code = 0;
00043         m_icmp_packet->header.checksum = 0;
00044         m_icmp_packet->header.id = htons(id);
00045         m_icmp_packet->header.seq = htons(sequence);
00046 #ifdef _WIN32
00047         m_icmp_packet->header.timestamp = GetTickCount();
00048 #else
00049         time_t t;
00050         m_icmp_packet->header.timestamp = time(&t);
00051 #endif
00052 
00053         fillData();
00054         calculateChecksum();
00055 }
00056 
00057 IcmpPacket::IcmpPacket(const char* payload, const int size)
00058 {
00059         m_size = size;
00060         m_buffer = new char[size];
00061         memcpy(m_buffer, payload, size);
00062         m_icmp_packet = (icmp_packet *)m_buffer;
00063 }
00064 
00065 IcmpPacket::~IcmpPacket()
00066 {
00067         delete [] m_buffer;
00068 }
00069 
00070 const char* IcmpPacket::rawData() const
00071 {
00072         return m_buffer;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void IcmpPacket::fillData()
00076 {
00077         char *pos = 0;
00078         int bytesLeft = m_size - sizeof(icmp_header);
00079 
00080         pos = &(m_icmp_packet->data);
00081 
00082         while (bytesLeft > 0)
00083         {
00084                 memcpy (pos, (const char *)&m_dataBytes, 
00085                                 min(bytesLeft,(int)sizeof(m_dataBytes)));
00086                 pos += sizeof(m_dataBytes);
00087                 bytesLeft -= sizeof(m_dataBytes);
00088         }
00089 }
00090 
00091 void IcmpPacket::calculateChecksum()
00092 {
00093         uint16_t* buf = 0;
00094         int count = 0;
00095         uint32_t checksum = 0L;
00096 
00097         buf = (uint16_t*) m_buffer;
00098         count = m_size;
00099         while (count > 1)
00100         {
00101                 checksum += *buf;
00102                 buf++;
00103                 count -= 2;
00104         }
00105 
00106         if (count > 0)
00107         {
00108                 checksum += *buf;
00109         }
00110 
00111         checksum = (checksum & 0xffff) + (checksum >> 16);
00112 
00113         m_icmp_packet->header.checksum = (uint16_t)~checksum;
00114 }
